participant_1.background:
I need to take care of my parents and my body to keep my modeling career going.
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
I like driving my red Impala.
i live on a boat.

participant_2.background:
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
i like to hunt for my food.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
i sing in the school chorus.
i once saw peyton manning at the grocery store.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a model. What are you up to?
Hi! I'm a singer in the school chorus. I just got home from a grocery store run. I saw Peyton Manning!
Wow, that's awesome! I love food and singing! I once saw a sloth in the wild!
A sloth? That's so cool! I love sloths! Where did you see one?
I was on a trip to the Amazon rainforest. It was amazing!
That sounds like an amazing trip! I'd love to go to the rainforest someday.
You should! It's so beautiful. What's your favorite thing to do in the grocery store?
I love looking for new and interesting foods. I'm always trying to find new recipes to try.
That's cool! I love trying new foods too. I once went to a restaurant that served alligator. It was really good!
Alligator? That sounds interesting! I've never had alligator before.
You should try it! It's really good
